21 double remove_w, remove_h, z_max, z_min;
22 bool save = false;
23 
24 typedef pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI> PointCloud;
25 PointCloud cloud_blob;
26 bool newCloud = false;
27 void callback(const PointCloud::ConstPtr& msg){
28  pcl::copyPointCloud(*msg, cloud_blob);
29  newCloud = true;
30 }
31 
32 void saveCallback(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr &msg)
33 {
34  save = msg->data;
35 }
36 
37 void dynamicCallback(nimbus_cloud::cloudEditConfig &config, uint32_t data)
38 {
39  remove_w = config.per_width;
40  remove_h = config.per_height;
41  z_max = config.z_max;
42  z_min = config.z_min;
43 }
44 
45 int main(int argc, char** argv){
46  ros::init(argc, argv, "nimbus_driver_io_node");
47  ros::NodeHandle nh;
48  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe<PointCloud>("/nimbus/pointcloud", 10, callback);
49  ros::Subscriber subSave = nh.subscribe<std_msgs::Bool>("save_pointcloud", 10, saveCallback);
50  ros::Publisher pub = nh.advertise<PointCloud>("pointcloud", 5);
51  static tf2_ros::StaticTransformBroadcaster staticTrans;
52 
53  cloudMean<pcl::PointXYZI> cE(nh);
54  nimbus::cloudEdit <pcl::PointXYZI> cloud_edit(nh);
55 
56  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<nimbus_cloud::cloudEditConfig> server;
57  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<nimbus_cloud::cloudEditConfig>::CallbackType f;
58  f = boost::bind(&dynamicCallback, _1, _2);
59  server.setCallback(f);
60 
61  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped cameraPose;
62  cameraPose.child_frame_id = "Mcamera";
63  cameraPose.header.frame_id = "world";
64  cameraPose.transform.translation.x = 0;
65  cameraPose.transform.translation.y = 0;
66  cameraPose.transform.translation.z = 1;
67  tf2::Quaternion q;
68  q.setRPY(-1.57, 1.57, 0);
69  cameraPose.transform.rotation.x = q.x();
70  cameraPose.transform.rotation.y = q.y();
71  cameraPose.transform.rotation.z = q.z();
72  cameraPose.transform.rotation.w = q.w();
73 
74  while (ros::ok())
75  {
76  if(newCloud){
77  if(cE.cloudQueue.size() < 20){
78  cE.cloudQueue.enqueue(cloud_blob);
79  newCloud = false;
80  }
81  else{
82  PointCloud::Ptr cloud(new PointCloud());
83  PointCloud::Ptr cloudE(new PointCloud());
84  PointCloud::Ptr cloudZ(new PointCloud());
85  cE.meanFilter (*cloud, cloud_blob.width, cloud_blob.height);
86  cloud_edit.remover(cloud, cloud_blob.width, cloud_blob.height, remove_w, remove_h, *cloudE);
87  float addZ = 0;
88  float counter = 0;
89 
90  cloud_edit.zRemover(cloudE, z_max, z_min, *cloudZ);
91  if(save == true){
92  ROS_INFO("Saving");
93  pcl::io::savePCDFile("model1.pcd", *cloudZ);
94  ROS_INFO("Saved");
95  save == false;
96  }
